website_summaries.verdict: A large, durable beverage dispenser that can keep your drinks cool for hours.
pros: Removable ice cone in center keeps beverages cool
Made of plastic so it will not break if dropped
cons: Spout can leak if washers are not installed correctly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is fantastic! We have used it for lemonade and sangria so far. Word of advice - small fruit, such as raspberries, can clog the dispenser tap. Next time I make sangria, I'll stick with larger cut fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit a mu baby shower. Note:be sure to put the washers in correctly for the nozzles or it will leak.
customer_reviews.author: Twilight Love

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, worked fine no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for a baby shower I was hosting. I loved the decorating opportunity the base offered. The spigots attached easily and didn’t leak at all. The spigots do feel a little flimsy, hopefully they will stand the test of time. These will be great for entertaining, so many possibilities for decor under them, matching the Party theme.
customer_reviews.author: Lan B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a huge birthday party. It is easy to assemble and disassemble. Very few pieces and it is relatively easy to wash. The height of the biggest piece is a challenge when washing only because it is very tall. It would pose a problem for anyone with a spray hose attachment to sink. The best thing about it is the ice core inside. The picture I included doesn't really capture the size of this item. A friend was trying to capture the paw patrol theme of my party and didn't give a good perspective of the dispenser itself.
customer_reviews.author: bcre8tiv

customer_reviews.title: I really like this item
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. It was great for all the kids coming and going this summer. However, I wish that it would have fit under my cupboards in my kitchen and that is not the items fault. Mine because I never thought about it. Also, I have only hand washed the item. Yet it does seem to have a cloudy appearance to the plastic. I am not sure why. It started after 5 or 6 time we used it. I can not get out. I have used dish soap, super hot water, blench, vinegar, and over counter sprays, and nothing works. Other than that the item works really well. We used it for lemonade, tea, and juice.
customer_reviews.author: Lady from MI

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for my wedding a couple years ago. They worked great! Since then they've been used in another wedding, a couple baby showers, and a few parties. These work really great and are extremely easy to use. I only wish I could put them in the dishwasher! But that's because I'm lazy, not because they're hard to clean lol I've had them for 4 years and they look just as good as the day I pulled them out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Juniper

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed the second time around
customer_reviews.text: When opening, the ice cone was jammed so tightly inside the dispenser that it broke a piece off to get it removed. I used care and caution to try to get it removed without damage but it was impossible. I bought this same dispenser four years ago from Amazon and it included a rubber nonskid ring that fit in the base to keep the dispenser from moving. This ring was not included in my box. The plastic looks and feels cheaper than my original one. Overall, I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Assembled in under 5 minutes. Drinks on me!
customer_reviews.text: In hindsight I probably should've unpacked and assembled this beverage dispenser more than 30 minutes before my event was scheduled to start. But you can rest assured that you too can pull off an amazing hosted beverage service at your baby shower, backyard BBQ, reunion, Sunday brunch, or whatever with literally no preparation. Just like me! I had this thing out of the box, assembled, leak-tested, and cleaned in under 5 minutes. (It's amazing the things you can accomplish under duress). Shortly later my drink recipe was complete and ready to serve. And this pitcher is large enough that you won't have to remake another batch!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappintment
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time actually taking out of the box and put on the floor, and it leaked. It first started with drizzle and then progressed to uncontrollable spilled all over the place. It leaked where the drink come out. It made whole table messy and had to replace the linen. :(
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, cyrstal looking, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dispenser for my daughter's open house. It matched one my church already had so the beverage station looked really nice with colorful punches in these clear fountains. Very easy to put together and came well packaged and quick. I am going to keep an eye out for another one at a great price as having one for punch and one for water is a great help for any party or gathering. Putting fruits in is easy too, put them in the center cone and they don't sink to the bottom to clog the spout like many other dispensers like this.
customer_reviews.author: J Timmer

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep cool drinks!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known something was wrong when this thing had so many positive reviews with so few negatives. If you are buying this because you believe this will keep your drinks cool then think again. The ice tray device does not work very well and definitely won't be keeping anything cool. It does work to dispense drinks, but the impression I got from the other reviews were that this would help keep drinks cool for hours during these hot times, but it does not do the job. Honestly, save your money and go elsewhere unless you are just looking for a dispenser that looks nice, but doesn't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Chuan

customer_reviews.title: Great item for tight budget!
customer_reviews.text: Fill dispenser once you have picked out the proper place for it. I filled mine on the counter and had to move it back into the fridge to get cold. Can be a bit fragile if moving and would not recommend. Be careful not to use fruit that can be broken down, it can get clogged. A piece of pineapple got stuck in the spout and clogged it mine. I had to serve my guests with a laddle.
customer_reviews.author: RayWal

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's Grad party. Love the design of this. It holds a ridiculous amount of punch, and the height of it means a red solo cup fits perfect under the spout. The design is genius in that the ice sits in the middle container, not watering down the punch, and makes it easier to replace the ice on a hot day. Also like the rubber bottom as it keeps the entire container grounded. I've used this several different times, and I'm really impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Spiggot drips a little
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed product. Seriously made unbreakable, base is a nice feature as are the ice cone and tight lid. Were this falls shore is the valve, Every time I open it, it leaks a tablespoon of water after I close it I have Walmart dispensers, half the size but 1/8th the price that do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: and this item is so great! It's easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of parties, and this item is so great! It's easy to clean, the spout works without dripping and it has a good flow so you don't have to wait long to fill your cup. The bottom has a rubber strip so the unit won't slip or move. It has a great container down the middle of it for ice which keeps the drink cold and the ice doesn't melt into your beverage. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Raben

customer_reviews.title: Haven't leaked so far
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and didn't leak when tested for an hour with water, will have to see how they hold up at the wedding. I like the way the reservoir is all one piece except for the spigot, definitely helps. The shape is slightly ungainly, but not ugly and I do like the way the removable base fits inside the reservoir. Took me a while to figure out the weird black hose was meant to go under the base to prevent slipping, wish the directions were more clear about that. EDIT: They survived the wedding just fine(despite 90 degree heat) and my mother-in-law took them home after, haven't heard any complaints for her a year later!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Lemonade Stand!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dispenser for an outdoor party. The day turned out to be really hot. We filled the dispenser 2/3 of the way/2 gallons with lemonade. It kept the lemonade ice cold for the whole party. Only concern is that it is pretty large; holds three gallons. But it pretty, functional, comes with its own stand so cups fit under the spigot and the center holds ice without the ice melting into the drink but keeps the drink very cold. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PDR Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: We use it all the time, have seen others with the same and they use it all the time and love it also. Easy to clean, easy to use, great capacity. Looks nice when in use. easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: juliannaB

customer_reviews.title: Use large pieces of fruit
customer_reviews.text: I had three of these at my wedding they worked out great! Like everyone else I would recommend large pieces of fruit as small pieces such as berries will get caught in the spout
customer_reviews.author: Alicia j Sidles

customer_reviews.title: Cracked! Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few weeks in advance for my baby shower. We got it set up for the shower...it was cracked on the bottom so it was useless. Punch leaked everywhere. I was so disappointed. Especially because the return window had passed and I couldn't even get my money back. Money down the drain...
customer_reviews.author: Devin B.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. Love the insert for ice cubes. This stand is high enough that you can get most glasses under the spigot on a surface - you don't have to have the spigot at the edge of a surface over the floor and I really appreciated that. There was a little bit of leakage at the spigot, but it was really minor and I sat the whole arrangement of a couple of colorful towels. I would recommend practicing with this before company comes in case you have a little dripping or something. But it is a great product for an even greater price!
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a hostess
customer_reviews.text: Amazon dispensers! Hold so much liquid and keep drinks cold. The plastic is super heavy duty so I’m not worried about them cracking. I had no issues with leaking and really Liked having the ability to remove the ice holder portion. These are great for parties and look and feel a lot more expensive than they are. Great item to have if you entertain often
customer_reviews.author: JudeasMom

customer_reviews.title: Oh so faaaancy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and add such an elegance to your event. Bought for.my wedding and everyone is asking to borrow them .. I wouldnt put.lil pieces of.fruit or berries but lemon slices or cucumbers are great.. the middle console meant for.ice works great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Was looking for something a little smaller but decided on this one because it looked so nice. It IS nice, well built, dispenser works perfectly, no leaks. I just don't use the bottom stand and then it doesn't look so giant size.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sy

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big beverage server, but it does leak a bit from the spout connection. I have even had my husband look at it & tighten it...still a dribbler. I usually just put a kitchen towel around the base to collect the water. Over all it is a nice big beverage server.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline W. Dager

customer_reviews.title: Made In the U.S.A
customer_reviews.text: Mine was scratched even before I used it. I love the fact that you put the ice in a separate reservoir from the drinks and the capacity is 3 gal. I tried this with water and I had no leak issues. I then used it on X-mas day for some cocktail mixture and it had a slow leak around the spigot/spout area. With liquid in it, I find it difficult to make any adjustments. None seem to help the situation. I will try again with water and make adjustment before using with actual drink mixes. Hopefully, this is something that can be fixed with simple adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Chippendales

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Wish there were size options.
customer_reviews.text: Great for very large parties!! Just be aware how large this thing is. We have plenty of places to store things so we are fine, but it does take up a bit of space. We put 2 gallons of liquid in this for a party and it looked like it wasn't even half full. I love the product though! It worked great and looks great! The ice in the middle is awesome... no watered down drinks, which is especially important if there is alcohol involved! It would just be nice if they had the option of a smaller size. I count this as a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used this more than I thought I would!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! From rum punch for adult parties, iced tea for baby showers to lemonade for kids birthday parties, this has been amazing! The center ice core keeps things cold without watering down and it’s super easy to keep the ice fresh at all times, since the core is so simply to remove. This thing has been great in our home!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not for high volume use
customer_reviews.text: The lids crack easily. In the beverage containers defense I do use them in my restaurant on a daily basis. I would imagine for occasional in home use they would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: SB mom 805

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I think it would be alot better ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I think it would be alot better if somehow the base screwed on so you could actually create a design inside or fill with fruit as shown in the picture. I made a small zoo and put the dispenser over it. It was really cute.Also maybe a strainer or screen in the spigot so you can use fresh fruit. It got clogged but we fixed it. Overall great product. One more thing, on the way to the party, everything was loaded in a pick up truck...they lost my lid to the dispenser, how much to replace it?
customer_reviews.author: Denise Amill

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE!!! I bought 3 of them for my daughters wedding reception back in 2012 and we still use them in the family for entertaining. I had researched several before purchasing them and the issue was the spigots not holding up. Well it has been all this time and the spigots are still holding on and doing well! Another great feature of these is that they are plastic and not glass. One would think glass would be nicer, but not so, they are much too heavy once you get the liquid in them. I highly recommend these and would NEVER let mine go! They are too useful and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: scratced before I even got to use them
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these for a long time. I ordered two to be used at my son's graduation party and my older son's wedding. I was expecting the silver spigot and got black. When it came, the ice cone was wedged deep inside the tank on both of them. I had to work carefully so I didn't break the prongs (although they do seem very sturdy). However, in the process of removing them the inside of the tanks were scratched up. I'm also a little concerned after reading some of the review because I intend to use them for lemon-aid and do not want them etched before the wedding. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Seems like this is going to work fine. I'll keep you updated. Just wanted to get this review up here to let folks know that considerable assembly is required. Fortunately, it comes with directions but you are going to have to outfit this thing with its spigot and put all the pieces together. It's not difficult but for me it was unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Sand

customer_reviews.title: Great product for larger functions where you want liquids things cool in hot weather.
customer_reviews.text: This is very useful and cost-effective for non-carbonated drinks at a large function where you want to keep things cool in warm temperatures. The ability to freeze water in the cooling reservoir is great for producing a solid piece of ice that cools for a long time in hot temperatures if your freezer is large enough to fit the unit to freeze it. If not, you can fill it with ice cubes. It is reusable.
customer_reviews.author: GregLawyer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning. The dispenser started leaking after I poured the wine inside the container. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: edward gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: When this came, I was surprised by the quality of packaging as well as the product. The directions are clear, the container wasn't scratched, the spigot didn't leak, the center cone screws in just right--and easily, and it made for a wonderful lemonade dispenser for our daughter's 1st birthday party (about 20 guests). The stand is sturdy and a great height--even has a removable rubber ring in the bottom so the stand doesn't slip. Great investment--it's worth the space it takes up in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: I love that the ice is contained and does not melt ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's 40th birthday/Halloween party. I served Black Widow Spider punch in it. I have used it several times since. .I love that the ice is contained and does not melt into the punch & dilute it. I also love the clear base. One can put decorator items such as small skulls, fruit, etc. in it to jazz up the presentation. No leaking noticed and it cleans up very easily. All this and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Cort

customer_reviews.title: Bev Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this. The size is very good. It is large and holds a lot. It feels very durable. I've used it several times, disassembling it and washing after each use. No scratches or discolorations and the valve at the bottom seems to be holding firm. When completely full, it is stable and does not tip over. One time used it was even on a slanted table. Additional: While it doesnt leak or tip, for peace of mind, i wish it locked into the base better. I also wish it had handles on the side for transport because you cant really move it when its full.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect for any event
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost 5 years ago for my wedding and they have been super useful ever since. I’ve been using them when we have at least 15 guests or more since it holds a lot for a small group. I don’t use the “ice core” since our punches use ice to allow for the punch to get the right sweetness throughout the party and keeps the drink cool for longer. It does get small scratches over time but you don’t really notice them for the most part. I bought two and are a staple in our home for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelee

customer_reviews.title: Missing the non-slip O-ring for the Base
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, one came with everything - Thank You. the other is missing the O-ring that is inserted in the base to keep it from sliding around. I contacted Buddeez via their website (they don't give a pone number). I'm hoping I won't have to return this one and re-order :(
customer_reviews.author: Jakester

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This beverage dispenser is just what I needed. I keep it on my counter top & fill it with water. It's large, so you really need quite a bit of space; but fortunately, I have that. I bought it because it has the removable ice cone in the center, which is a great feature for entertaining. However, for daily use, we drink room-temperature water, so I leave the ice cone out. The dispenser can either be used alone, or placed on the stand. I leave it on the stand, because it raises up the dispenser high enough that I can slide a large water glass under the spigot to fill it. This is a well-designed product.
customer_reviews.author: PCH

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a surprise 60th birthday party for my husband...I love it and so did others at the party! We used it for sugar free lemonade and it kept it nice and cold. Everyone loved this and several asked where I got it... I kept the box it came n for storage and will be using it again in May at a family reunion...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Do not order!!!! This product came cracked or something....It leaks.
customer_reviews.author: msshavers1

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to assemble everything and noticed i forgot the place the rubber at the bottom of the base. I went to take the top part off and the base had attached to it and then dropped onto the floor. The base cracked in half and a piece chipped from a 2.5ft accidental drop onto kitchen tile. Had literally taken it out of the box 5 mins prior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Purchased 2 then ordered 1 more for client. Looks good, durable easy to set-up and clean. I cater so I need a large capacity drink dispenser. This works great for all occassions.
customer_reviews.author: D Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time for family gatherings and fellowship events at my church. It has made it so easy for everyone, especially children, to help themselves to punch rather than using a punch bowl or gallon containers.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable?  I think not.
customer_reviews.text: Since I did manage to accidentally break the base by dropping in on a tile floor, I think the description of "Unbreakable" is unjustified. Other than having a cracked base, I really like this item.
customer_reviews.author: JMG Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! Self serve for sangria's and mojitos
customer_reviews.text: Just used two of these for graduation party. GREAT! Self serve for sangria's and mojitos. Small fruit (raspberries) once clogged the spout on the Sangria. To unclog it...the only solution that worked was to have someone bend over and blow up the spout..with "faucet" in the open position. It was kinda gross, kinda hilarious...and the party was back on tract. ALSO, put lights, fake or real fruit underneath the container to decorate. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Khloe blattert

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a drink dispenser for a large outdoor party. Large enough and preferably with a feature to keep the beverage cool, so we could fill it up to start the party and then leave it alone. Worked perfectly. We were a little apprehensive about the other comments regarding leaking. No problems. I have left the spout in-place since assembly, and run a good bit of hot soapy water thru to clean it, but don't break the seal. It looks much more expensive than it is. Holds alot of beverage. Easy to assemble, clean and repack in the box to store. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this beverage container. I filled the funnel with water and put it in the freezer. Hours later it was still frozen. I like that the nozzle is up high so you can fill a glass without it hanging over the edge of the counter and maybe dripping on the floor. It is a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large crowds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Thanksgiving and it was perfect. No leaks! We did use the ice cone to help keep the tea chilled and it worked fine. The non slip O ring that comes with it for the bottom was too big but my clever husband installed it and trimmed the rubber ring. It doesn't have to be a complete ring to work. It worked fine after trimming and the dispenser did not move on the counter. It is easy to put together and to take apart for cleaning. Highly recommend this product and would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: crjdeb

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best drink dispenser I have ever had. Great quality, cute design! I've gotten so many compliments at parties I've hosted. Holds a lot of liquid and the ice compartment keeps the beverage cold. I recommend this item to everyone I know. Just love this!
customer_reviews.author: tifanni e.

customer_reviews.title: I loved! The perfect cute touch for our party
customer_reviews.text: I loved ! The perfect cute touch for our party
customer_reviews.author: Angel Hurtado Pena

customer_reviews.title: NO MFG CARTON just a box
customer_reviews.text: This Item did not come in a MFG box..with picture, instructions nothing. Just put in a card board box ..??
customer_reviews.author: BJ   LOPRESTI

customer_reviews.title: Buddeez unbreakable 3 1/2 gallon beverage dispenser w/removable ice cone
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my daughter's wedding reception! Love Love Love them! They were perfect, fit the décor beautifully and we didn't run out of cold drink the whole reception. I like that they have their own stand with a no slide bottom and ice cone and clean up was a breeze! They store very easily after wards, every thing fits inside each other and goes right back into the box. I highly recommend this product fancy enough for a wedding yet practical enough for a big family get together! no leaks, no mess, no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Shank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large functions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for church functions. I love that it is on a stand high enough to get cups under, that it holds 3 gal of drink and that it has a cylinder for the ice to keep drinks from getting watered down. (We served chocolate milk in the one for Easter brunch). Added bonus, everything stores inside the main unit. Very affordable for the price. Several people at church asked me where I got it - that in and of itself makes for a great review.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these beverage dispensers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these beverage dispensers. I was on a hunt for plastic due to the event location did not allow glass. They worked great and were perfect for my company picnic!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Flores

customer_reviews.title: Practical drink dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Bought my own after borrowing three that belong to my friend. Happy to have my own now for future use. Easy to disassemble and reassemble for cleaning purposes. Helpful to have the center ice core available. Spigot works great. Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: very useful product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughters birthday party and it really performed quite nicely. I had no leakage on the spout and after filling up the center funnel with ice it kept our lemonade quite cool even though it was sitting in direct sunlight for most of the party, I will be using it for other events. Only negative I see is that it is quite large I was hoping to use it in my home after the event for water on the kitchen counter but it is too large and not practical for that purpose, but for a party very handy indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R.

customer_reviews.title: They looked good and did not leak
customer_reviews.text: We bought two. They looked good and did not leak. We did serve sangria in one and a blueberry plugged the spout, but that was on us. I would do it again and just place a single layer of cheesecloth to prevent this from happening again.
customer_reviews.author: jet snail

customer_reviews.text: I don't know that these are unbreakable but I bought 3 of these for use at my daughters baby shower. They were perfect. It is a bit much to kepp taking apart and putting together for cleaning and putting back in the box but they are definately worth the purchase if you are having a gathering and want to save money on drinks. I used one for water with fruit in it, one for juice for kids and the other I filled with iced tea for adults. I love them and am very glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V

customer_reviews.title: One problem!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. The construction, size, ice bin in the center, how it is put together ...except......the spigot drips. Have tried tightening several different ways but it continues to drip. This past Sunday Fruit Punch on my floor. Hey, mfg. What am I doing wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make sangria for an outdoor party in the heat of the summer! It was great! The cone in the middle easily kept it fairly cold considering the circumstances. It held a large amount of sangria as well. At one point, the spout did become clogged, but it was easily cleaned. Three people at the party loved it so much, they ordered one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Leaks, leaks, leaks. I am going to try some food-grade sealant to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but found same one cheaper at Sam's club
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Semones

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Great beverage dispenser, I have multi of these. No leak, easy to cleaned and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding and baby shower punch dispensary!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to set up and take apart. I used it for baby showers and weddings. It's perfect for punch or fruit infused beverages . Perfect heavy glass look, but very lightweight. Must have!!
customer_reviews.author: mja11777

customer_reviews.title: and they worked out great. On top of that
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for an event, and they worked out great. On top of that, they are very easy to assemble, and I didn't experience any leaks, which I usually do with glass dispensers (these are plastic). They are an odd shape, though, which makes it difficult to lay labels flat on the surface (such as if you want to denote whether tea is sweet or unsweet, etc.) Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had a couple of these for a few years, used in a busy event space for iced tea and lemonade. Very sturdy. I had purchased a couple of glass dispensers (not from Buddeez) for something a little more elegant in one of our spaces, and was very disappointed in the quality. I have now ordered two more of these for that space as well. The iced tea has stained the one container a bit over the years, but that is to be expected. The spouts are nice and sturdy and do not leak. Good customer service from Buddeez directly as well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with the beverage dispenser. Purchased for a grad party. Worked really well, cleaned up easily, and packed back in the box. Loved the open area at the bottom, I put flowers in. Easy to add more punch, and not make a mess. Well work the money.
customer_reviews.author: Woo's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put together and looked great

Would definitely recommend this item. Several reviews stated it etched when used. We used it for a Blue drink (Blue Hawaiian punch/pineapple juice and 7 up) it sat all day and we did not have any issues with staining or etching. Very easy to clean

My sister saw them, and stole one while packing up everything from the baby shower... This product is sold in like versions at Wal-Mart, Kmart, Targets, etc starting at $40 in a 2.5-3 gal, but got both of mine for $40 total! I wish I could post pics, but I can't !
customer_reviews.author: hylifavrd

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a good price
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for a gathering, and they did the trick perfectly. They're stable, they hold a generous quantity, the ice insert helps keep things cool without watering down, and the dispensers did not leak or drip, unlike other similar solutions we have used in the past. Assembly, dis-assembly, and cleanup are also straightforward. Put it all together and these are awesome, and the price is right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Turner

customer_reviews.title: I just had to fill the core with ice cubes instead and that seemed to work pretty well. I do love the fact that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit at the last two parties I took it too. Unfortunately I have not had the opportunity to fill the core with water and freeze it. The core tapers out to the circumference of the top and it wouldn't fit in my grandmothers side by side freezer. I just had to fill the core with ice cubes instead and that seemed to work pretty well. I do love the fact that it is very classy looking and that it can't break. Super great value for this, you will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Be The Pooper At Your Own Party... Get This For Your Festive Beverages!
customer_reviews.text: I actually Really liked it, But my idea was to keep water in it & have it in the refrigerator... It was TOO big and there isn't any possible way to adjust shelves. However, If I ever needed something for a party, THIS would be it! I love that it had an inner core for ice cubes so your beverage doesn't get all watered down!
customer_reviews.author: FairyKat

customer_reviews.title: This dispenser needs a filter to eliminate clogs.

It might be okay for water or iced tea with larger slices of fruit but we used it for Sangria and the peach flesh clogged the spigit requiring us to ladle the sangria out. At Cosco I bought two dispensers of the same size that were of better quality and less expensive.

A must for entertainment.

My sister loaned us her 5 gallon, beautiful glass container for the lemonade and we bought this one for the iced tea. I was concerned it would look tacky next to my sisters but it was just as elegant and a whole lot easier to move (no where near as heavy as the glass one), fill & clean up was a breeze! My husband was impressed and that's saying something! I'm excited to use it for entertaining. It's a great product!

customer_reviews.title: Great item, packaging has changed

We just ordered some more, and they just came in plain brown boxes, which do not look like original packaging. That is why the product gets 4 stars and not 5. The packaging helps us store and identify the items. The brown boxes are not identifiable.

Since infused water is a big hit, especially for our ladies, I took the ice holder and drilled holes in it it create a defuser that will hold blueberries and not plug up the dispenser spicket.
